active_contributors.name: Stephen Tierney
active_contributors.bio: Stephen Tierney is a lecturer in Business Analytics at The University Sydney Business School. His research interests include machine learning, computer vision, image processing, data visualisation and recommendation systems.

active_contributors.name: Robert James
active_contributors.bio: Rob James is Postdoctoral Research Associate at University of Sydney.

research_team.name: Andrey Vasnev
research_team.bio: Associate Professor Andrey Vasnev is Head of the Discipline of Business Analytics at the University of Sydney Business School. His main research area is forecast combination in business, finance and economic applications.

research_team.name: Anastasios Panagiotelis
research_team.bio: Anastasios Panagiotelis is an Associate Professor of Business Analytics at the University of Sydney Business School. He is also a Director of the International Institute of Forecasters. His work lies in the intersection of business analytics, statistics and econometrics.

research_team.name: Chao Wang
research_team.bio: Dr Chao Wang received his PhD degree in Econometrics from The University of Sydney. He has two master degrees major in Machine Learning & Data Mining from Helsinki University of Technology and Mechatronic Engineering from Beijing Institute of Technology respectively.

research_team.name: Richard Gerlach
research_team.bio: Richard Gerlach's research interests lie mainly in financial econometrics and time series. His work has concerned developing time series models for measuring, forecasting and managing risk in financial markets as well as computationally intensive Bayesian methods for inference, diagnosis, forecasting and model comparison for these models.

past_contributors.name: David Houseman
past_contributors.bio: David Houseman has a PhD in theoretical physics from University College, London, and is a former contributor to the project. David's interests are financial time series and statistical modelling of stock returns.
